alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A line of showers with isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 700 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Gibbonsville Idaho to 17 miles north of Leadore Idaho. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Wisdom, Jackson, Grant, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Polaris, Bannack and Bannack State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
